description:
From his law office in Manchester, New Hampshire, attorney Jon N. Strasburger provides exceptional representation and support to clients across the region who are going through a divorce or some other serious family legal issue. In addition to family law, he also handles a wide range of other legal matters, and his law firm has become one of the area's most trusted sources for quality, effective and personalized representation for those who have legal needs involving the following:

• Family law and divorce
• Personal injury and wrongful death
• Car accidents and medical malpractice
• DUIs, DWIs and other types of felonies and misdemeanors
• General civil litigation
• Municipal and business law

Throughout the course of his more than 15 years in practice, Mr. Strasburger has gained a reputation for his compassion and integrity when dealing with his clients. He's also known for his tenacity and aggressive approach to helping them achieve the favorable outcomes they expect and deserve efficiently and cost-effectively.

Well versed in mediation and other alternative dispute resolution techniques, he prefers to help his family law clients resolve their conflicts and reach agreements in a manner that is more economical and less adversarial than traditional divorce litigation. However, if necessary, he will not hesitate to take his clients' issues to court to ensure the best odds of achieving the positive results they seek.

At all turns, Mr. Strasburger provides unmatched legal counsel with an eye toward protecting his clients' rights and best interests as well as those of their children. To find out how he can best assist you and your family during this difficult and uncertain time, you can contact Mr. Strasburger by phone, email or through his law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
